Service Details: - Teaches kids about healthy food and healthy food systems by putting volunteers into elementary schools to lead lessons on urban gardening and healthy, sustainable eating- Kids learn to grow their own garden and are lead through basic cooking lessons with the food they have grown themselves
How to Apply: If you are a teacher who would like your students to take part, a volunteer interested in supporting the program in your community, or a parent who would like your child to participate in this program, please visit our website for more information
